original_title: The Making of the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: 2004 Swimsuit Calendar
overview: Often imitated, never duplicated.  The world famous Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders. 21 of the most gorgeous cheerleaders in the world spend 7 grueling days in paradise to be photographed for an exclusive spot in the 2004 Swimsuit Calendar.  From sunrise to sunset, day after day, photo shoots are documented from both sides of the lens.  Crews battle the elements as the cheerleaders are captured on film in some of the most remote locations on the island of Cozumel. Not only witness the overwhelming beauty of the girls and the scenery, but what it truly takes out of dozens of people to bring such an exclusive calendar from concept to page.
title: The Making of the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: 2004 Swimsuit Calendar
